description:
Hotaru starts to age at an accelerated rate, growing from a baby to a young girl within days. As she slowly regains her memory and power as Sailor Saturn, she warns the other Outer Guardians of the coming danger that will soon befall Sailor Moon.
Source: hulu

titles.title: El despertar de Saturno. Las 10 Guerreros al completo
Saturn Awakens: The Ten Sailor Guardians Unite
Saturn no Mezame! Sailor 10 Senshi Shuuketsu
サターンの目覚め! S10戦士終結
